attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The abolishment of the planned unitary council for Norfolk. The keeping of borough councils and local control for local people. The scrapping of unnesscessary waste of money by creating a faceless monolith of a council.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
